front.title: RTP Payload Format for the Speex Codec

abstract.t: Speex is an open-source voice codec suitable for use in Voice over IP (VoIP) type applications. This document describes the payload format for Speex generated bit streams within an RTP packet. Also included here are the necessary details for the use of Speex with the Session Description Protocol (SDP).Editors Note All references to RFC XXXX are to be replaced by references to the RFC number of this memo, when published.
